She rejects a suggestion that she should make a film but we watch as she is talked into it. At the end of the day she greedily swallows his cum and then rewards the photographer by letting him work off his hard dick over her face. We set up a hidden camera in our Hotel room and send for the services of a physiotherapist to look at one of our 'crew' who has injured his leg. As she goes to work on the leg, certain indecent suggestions are made to this very straight 42 yrs old lady.
response.title: Peepshow Special 02
